tools.name: current_time
tools.title: Get Current Time
tools.description: Returns the current time in UTC and a specified or guessed timezone.

format.description: The format for the returned time string.

timezone.description: The IANA timezone name (e.g., "America/New_York"). Defaults to the server's guessed timezone.

tools.name: relative_time
tools.title: Get Relative Time
tools.description: Calculates the relative time from now to a given time string.

time.description: The time to compare. Format: YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss

tools.name: days_in_month
tools.title: Get Days in Month
tools.description: Returns the number of days in the month of a given date.

date.description: The date to check. Format: YYYY-MM-DD

tools.name: get_timestamp
tools.title: Get Timestamp
tools.description: Converts a date-time string to a Unix timestamp in milliseconds.

time.description: The time to convert. Format: YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss

tools.name: convert_time
tools.title: Convert Timezone
tools.description: Converts a time from a source timezone to a target timezone.

tools.name: get_week_year
tools.title: Get Week of Year
tools.description: Returns the week and ISO week number for a given date.
